article: president alvaro uribe acknowledged tuesday that he had intervened in an independent investigation of a jailed paramilitary leader , saying that investigators were trying to unk him in an unsuccessful plot to assassinate another militia chief .
abstract: leader says he intervened in an inquiry in colombia
